name: DR. SINI KWABE
detail: 789 Presidential Drive, Maitama, Abuja. Live in opulence in this lavish villa in Maitama. With 6 spacious bedrooms, a swimming pool, and a grand foyer, it's a true symbol of luxury in Abuja.

name: MR SEYI ADEDIRAN
detail: The Group Chief Executive (GCE) of Equilibrium Metro Homes was previously employed at Oxford Holding. Prior to that, he served as the Deputy Managing Director and Acting Managing Director of Alliance & General Insurance Plc. He was also an Executive Director of Sales and Marketing approved by NAICOM (National Insurance Commission).

name: MISS VICTORIA TENIOLA
detail: Miss Victoria is a reliable and proactive team player who consistently strives for excellence in all her endeavors. With a strong passion for problem-solving and a drive to increase productivity, she brings valuable skills and expertise to the table, through her extensive experience and education

name: ARC. NUREINI TEMITOPE
detail: Mr Nureni is known for his self-motivation, goal orientation, organizational skills, and efficiency. He holds a B.Sc. in Architecture and an M.Arch. From Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife, and an M.Sc. in Construction Management from the University of Lagos, Akoka. With 17 years of experience.

name: MR SEUN OWOLABI
detail: MR Owolabi Oluwaseun holds a B.Sc. Degree in Accounting at the University of Lagos, MSc finance with distinction at Caleb University and a fellow member of the Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria. He is also an associate member of Chartered Insurance Institute of Nigeria and currently undergoing his PhD program.

name: SURV. OHIKHUEME ANTHONY
detail: Surv. Ohikhueme Anthony Ikhide MNIS is a Land Surveying (now Geomatics) graduate of the prestigious Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria. He has experience spanning close to two decades in the areas of Construction, Surveying, Land Development, Management and Administration, and Geographic Information Systems (GIS).

name: MR OLUWOLE SAMSON
detail: Mr Oluwole Samson is a skilled computer scientist with a Bachelor's degree, excels in programming and software development. He possess strong problem-solving abilities and stay current with technology trends, making him a valuable asset in the field.

name: MISS PRISCILLA AGBA
detail: Find peace and comfort in this elegant duplex in Life Camp. Featuring 4 bedrooms, a landscaped garden, and a modern kitchen, it's perfect for a growing family.

name: MISS PROMISE NNANNA
detail: Find peace and comfort in this elegant duplex in Life Camp. Featuring 4 bedrooms, a landscaped garden, and a modern kitchen, it's perfect for a growing family.
